ValidationRule.description: Ensures that a number of fields are populated prior to progressing past the initial mortgage opportunity stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
RecordType.DeveloperName = "OW_mortgage"
&&
IsClosed = TRUE
&&
IsWon = FALSE
&&
ISBLANK( TEXT( OW_closed_reason__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When losing an opportunity, a closed reason must be provided.
